main.paxmeet_description: We re-engineered the service we built for secure business meetings, PaxMeet, to make it free and available for all.
main.no_one_can_join_meeting_unless_invited_o: No one can join a meeting unless invited or admitted by the host.
main.are_you_sure_delete_post: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
main.are_you_sure_archive_post: Are you sure you want to archive this post?

main.name: Name
main.empowering_connections_metaverse_descrip: Immerse yourself in a 3D world of endless possibilities. Your gateway to a connected metaverse experience. Join PaxinTrade and redefine your online presence with innovative features and interactions.
main.unleashing_future_online_interaction: Unleashing the Future of Online Interaction
main.unleashing_future_online_interaction_des: Explore the unique blend of online publishing and Telegram mailing. From streamlined searches to launching your 3D world.
main.hybrid_vision_description: Seamlessly combining online publishing with Telegram mailing for a novel digital experience.
main.swift_identification_description: Quickly identify and connect with other users on the Telegram network through our Pax platform.
main.advanced_communication_description: Enhance your Telegram communications with features for efficient indexing and information sharing.
main.3d_world_experience_description: Immerse yourself in a new dimension of creativity, where you can interact with familiar activities in a unique format.
main.navigating_your_digital_universe_descrip: Explore the unique blend of online publishing and Telegram mailing. From streamlined searches to launching your 3D world.
main.efficient_discovery_description: Utilize our advanced search engine for quick and efficient information discovery. Highlight your content and create a personalized space within our diverse platform.
main.private_asks_description: Easily identify and connect with others on the Telegram network for seamless sharing.
main.smart_filters_for_tailored_content_descr: Use our advanced filters to tailor your content consumption, ensuring a personalized and relevant digital experience.
main.positive_experience_from_early_users_des: Discover the experiences of PaxinTrade users who have found value and innovation in our platform.
main.what_is_paxintrade_description: Online portal that provides opportunities to search and share information within our dynamic network in interaction with the network of Telegram users. Our site combines the functionality of searching for user posts from Telegram and allows each such user to highlight their own content stream, creating a personalized web resource within our broad platform.
main.combination_of_services_in_one_platform: Combination of Services in One Platform
main.combination_of_services_in_one_platform_: We present ourselves as a unique combination of popular services such as Instagram, LinkedIn, Zoom, WhatsApp and Facebook Marketplace.
main.instagram_description: Connect with Reflect with dozens of applications without code
main.linkedin_description: Sync your reading highlights and notes with Reflect.
main.whatsapp_and_facebook_description: Save web clips and sync with your apps
main.unlock_new_dimension_of_connectivity: Unlock the New Dimension of Connectivity
main.unlock_new_dimension_of_connectivity_des: Ready to experience the next generation of online interaction? Join PaxinTrade now and embark on a journey where seamless communication, personalized content, and a 3D world await you. Create your account and redefine your digital presence today.
main.pax_footer_description: —Åhoice and freedom in every interaction your platform where worlds meet!
main.search_engine_description: With our unique search engine, you can easily find the information you are interested in by viewing posts and publications from other users.
main.verified_history_description: Given the rapid spread of fake news and misinformation online, we are creating a trusted space where each profile has a verified history of activity.
main.advanced_filters_description: With advanced filters and an intuitive interface, you can quickly find content that matches your interests.
main.verified_accounts_description: We place great importance on verifying user accounts over time. This ensures a high degree of authenticity and reliability of information distributed through our platform.
main.join_our_virtual_ecosystem: Join our virtual ecosystem where searching, sharing and interacting with information becomes more intelligent and satisfying. We pride ourselves on providing high quality content and the ability to create your own digital footprint in the online community world.
main.get_in_touch_description: Our friendly team would love to hear from you.
main.forgot_password_description: No worries, we will send you reset instructions.
main.accpet_terms_and_conditions_warning: Please accept the terms and conditions
